title: Vaccination and Deworming Tracker
description: Livestock Analytics is a data analytics service for NGOs to track their progress on deliverying a vaccination and deworming program for the rural households of Odisha in India

title: Menous DB
description: Menous DB is a lightweight, open-source database management system designed for simplicity and ease of use. It provides a RESTful API for managing databases and tables, making it suitable for a variety of applications

title: MenousDB Web Client
description: Menous DB Client is a web app that helps users connect to menousdb and perform all functionalities of the database from a web pased program that helps users to interact with the database without writing any code themselves

title: Spotify Downloader
description: This web app is workaround around spotify premium. It uses the public Spotify API paired with the public YouTube API to donwload songs. It basically provides a free alternative to spotify premium.
